class.name: FoldableGroup
class.brief_description: A group of foldable containers that doesn't allow more than one container to be expanded at a time.
class.description: A group of [FoldableContainer]-derived nodes. No more than one container can be expanded at a time.

method.name: get_containers
method.description: Returns an [Array] of [FoldableContainer]s who have this as their [FoldableGroup] (see [member FoldableContainer.foldable_group]).

members.member: If [code]true[/code], it is possible to fold all containers in this [FoldableGroup].

signal.name: expanded
signal.description: Emitted when one of the containers of the group is expanded.
